org.libav.net.rtsp

Class AbstractSingleMediaStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.net.rtsp.AbstractMediaStream
      • org.libav.net.rtsp.AbstractSingleMediaStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMediaStream, ISingleMediaStream
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CopyStream, TranscodeStream

    public abstract class AbstractSingleMediaStream
extends AbstractMediaStream
implements ISingleMediaStream
    Abstract single media stream. Implements common single media stream methods.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka
